fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Mark a player at night.
- (Rehearsal) Mark all of a player's visitors, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Immediately kill all marked players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**- Rehearsal Radius: 3**
- Marks are permanent unless the target is Purged. You know if a mark is removed.
